channel.title: Physics on oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: LightWaveExplorer
item.description: Lightwave explorer is an open source nonlinear optics simulator, intended to be fast, visual, and flexible for students and researchers to play with ultrashort laser pulses and nonlinear optics without having to buy a laser first.

item.title: SYCL FNIRS Motion Detectio
item.description: SYCL machine learning libraries to detect motion detection in fNIRS.

item.title: OneMD
item.description: oneMD is a molecular dynamics simulator designed to take advantage of SIMD and GPU and FPGA hardware data parallelism and acceleration.
